is a small town and skiresort in

. Geilo is one of the best known and most populare skiing areas in Scandinavia - but is also a highly cherished area for summer and autumn activities such as hiking, biking, fishing, rafting, glacier walk and more. At an elevation of 794 m (2605 ft) the ski season does not end until late April or early may. Geilo is a small town and has few shops and entertainment spots. The town centre includes several sport shops, tourist information, supermarkets, cafés & restaurants, newsagents and a range of other shops. Down the road there is a small cinema, library, and school. There is also a large sports hall (Geilohallen), which is also the cross country club (Geilo IL). Behind the building is a floodlit prepared cross country track, and a biathlon shooting range.

For a small town there is a large choice of hotels and apartments. One of the hotels is one of Norway’s most famous, Dr Holms. Others include the Bardøla, Vestlia, which is on the door step of Geilolia ski centre, Ustedalen and the Highland Hotel. You will also find plenty of cabins and apartments for rent in Geilo - most on a self catering basis. Geilolia Cabins & Apartments, Kikut and Geilo Apartement is some of the main suppliers for the self catering marked.
Earlier there was an small airport at Dagali, this is now only open for small private planes. So the closest option is
line. The train use 3 hour and 40 minutes from Oslo.
Geilo is on route 7. Distance from Oslo is 243 km (151 mi). Geilo is on the end of route 40 from

value:
content=Hallingskarvet View 03 – 06PM 25 June - 15 August
Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday

Geilolia Summer Park has an open chair lift, which will take you up to the top of Geilolia. This is a wonderful vantage point for photography, with views over Norway’s most famous national park. Then you have the choice of going down in the lift or walking along our nature trail.This event is suitable for everyone!

Price: Adults: NOK 50.- Round trip: NOK 65.- Children: NOK 30.- Round trip: NOK 45.-

content=Geilolia Summer Park is open for visitor from mid-June til mid-August. The Summer park is a natural starting point for fishing, hiking and biking trips. We also have canoe and bike rental. The Geilolia Tree Top Walk (High ropes courses) is one of the biggest you will find in Norway, with a 150 metres zip line. You will also find a childrens play area, open cafeteria, summer lift, rafting, golf, spa and other activities at Geilolia Summer Park.

content=Cycle hire 09AM – 08PM
Daily 25 June - 15 August
Cycles are available for hire at Geilolia Summer Park.
The Arena is a great starting point for lovely cycling
tours in the region, such as the one round the
Ustedal fjord. Suitable for: Everyone
Price: Town bike from NOK 99.- per day

content=Canoe hire 09AM - 08PM
Daily 25 June - 15 August
There are a number of canoes for hire at Geilolia Summer
Park. They are easily accessible on the Ustedal
fjord. Fishing tackle can also be hired and fishing permits
are sold at Geilolia Summer Park.
Suitable for: Everyone Price: NOK 100.- per hour.
Including lifejacket and paddles.

content=Rafting at 10.35AM (the bus departs)
Daily 25 June - 15 August
Geilolia Summer Park and Serious Fun cooperate to
give you the best rafting on the Numedalslågen. Join in
anything from a family trip just for fun to challenging
extreme rafting. The guides are among the best in the
world when it comes to safety and experience. It will be
an unforgettable experience!
Suitable for: Ages 8+ Price: From NOK 350.- per person
Guide & equipment included.

content=Geilolia Play park 09AM – 08PM (06PM)
Daily 25 June - 15 August
We want all the family to enjoy themselves at Geilolia,
so we added an outdoor playland, where the youngest in
the family can scamper about while Mum and Dad relax.
Suitable for: Everyone Price: Free
name=Geilolia Tree Top Walk / High Ropes Courses

content=Geilolia Treetop Walk (High Ropes Courses) 12 – 6PM
Daily 25 June - 15 August
This year’s great new feature in Geilo! The Treetop Walk
is one of the largest in Norway, and offers 29 different
challenges with varying degrees of difficulty. It includes
zip lines (aerial runways), and one is a thrilling 150
metres long!
Suitable for: Everyone taller than 140cm
Price: NOK 250.- per person
Instructor & equipment included.

content=Geilolia Bungee trampoline 09AM – 08PM (6PM)
Daily 25 June - 15 August
The bungee trampoline at Geilolia Summer Park is
another feature which bigger children will enjoy. Up to
four people can jump at the same time.
Suitable for: Everyone weighing between 20-90kg.
Price: NOK 50.- per person for 5 minutes

content=Horse riding 03 – 05PM
Monday, Wednesday, Friday, 25 June – 15 August.
Geilolia Summer Park offers rides for children three
days a week. The route is laid out so that parents can
go with their children when they are accompanied by an
approved riding instructor from Geilo Riding Centre. You
can also book longer rides from Geilolia Summer Park.
Suitable for: Everyone
Price: NOK. 85.- per round (approx. 10 minutes)

content=Barbecue trip for all the family 03 – 05PM
Monday, Wednesday, Friday, 25 June - 15 August
Together with the ‘Mountain pilot’ from Høve Støtt,
Geilolia Summer Park invites you to have fun on a trip
to the top of Geilolia. We walk in towards the Hakkesett
mountain farm and pause along the way to look at the
exciting things around us. All the family will enjoy the
trip and probably learn something new.
Suitable for: Everyone
Price: NOK 100.- per person
NOK NOK 250.- per family (2 adults, 2 children)

content=Glacier walking 10.15AM
Tuesday, Wednesday and Saturday
25 June - 15 August.
Go for a long, exciting walk with Geilolia Summer Park
and the Mountain pilot! The route goes in towards Finse
and then to the famous Hardanger glacier with its fabulous
blue ice. This is a very exciting chance if you want
to see southern Norway from the roof of the world. Our
guide has all the necessary certificates to make sure
you can feel safe all the way.
Price: NOK 590.- per person
Including return ticket by train to Finse

content=Geilolia Paintball park 12 – 06PM
Tuesday, Thursday, Sunday 25 June – 15 August
There are activities at Geilolia Summer Park for those
who need an adrenalin rush on their holidays! You can
find out who pulls the trigger fastest, and who is best at
hide-and-seek while you fire away at your friends. The
Paintball range is built for safety and situated where it
will not spoil other people’s enjoyment of the summer
scene.
Suitable for: Everyone above 12 years old
Price: NOK 150.- per person
Instructor & equipment included, with 200 paintballs

content=Nature and troll-spotting safari, 08PM
Monday - Friday
Geilolia Summer Park offers guided nature and trollspotting
safaris where we see elk and look for signs
of trolls. The route goes through Langedrag Nature
Park, where we may also meet wolves, lynx, reindeer,
mountain foxes and many other animals.
Suitable for: Everyone
Price: Adults NOK 350.-
Children: kr. 200.- (under 3 years free)
content=Bowling,dine in or take it away.

content=Offer a wide range of beer, spiits and wine. Here you also can see all the big football matches.

content=Geilolia Cabins are situated next to Geilolia Ski Centre and Summer Park.Cabins with 6-12 beds. Geilolia Apartments are situated at the town centre of Geilo - within walking distance to shops, restaurants and activities. The apartments sleep 4-7 people.

Cabins & Apartments. Phone: +47 3209 0000 / booking@geilolia.no
